mapper.select: select userid, password, name, email, tel, gender, birthday, to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday, quitYN from tbl_userinfo where quitYN = 1 and userid = #{userid} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_userinfo(userid, password, name, email, tel, gender, birthday, registerday, quitYN) values(#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, default, default)
mapper.select: select userid from tbl_userinfo where quitYN = 1 and name = #{name} and tel = #{tel}
select count(*) from tbl_userinfo where quitYN = 1 and userid = #{userid} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update tbl_userinfo set password = #{pwd} where quitYN = 1 and userid = #{userid}
update tbl_userinfo set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, gender = #{gender} where quitYN = 1 and userid = #{userid}
update tbl_userinfo set quitYN = 0 where quitYN = 1 and password = #{password} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_like(fk_seq_schedule, fk_userid, likecnt) values(#{seq_schedule}, #{userid}, default)
